mapper.insert: insert into pf_banner(company_no, title, image, url, start_date, end_date, activate) values (#{companyNumber}, #{title}, #{filePath}, #{url}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{activateYN})
mapper.select: select banner_no, title, start_date, end_date, activate from pf_banner where activate=1
select banner_no, title, start_date, end_date, activate from pf_banner where activate=0 order by end_date desc
select banner_no, company_no, title, image, url, register_date, start_date, end_date, activate from pf_banner where banner_no=#{number}
